message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now before inflation eats into our profits.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Considering inflation, I believe this is a fair split.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's be reasonable - I'll take a smaller cut than my last offer, but I won't accept less than $55. It's a deal or we both lose out.
